thread.title: BREAKING: Anti-Trump rioters force university into LOCKDOWN after hurling flares on campus
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Anti-Trump rioters force university into LOCKDOWN after hurling flares on campus

title: BREAKING: Anti-Trump rioters force university into LOCKDOWN after hurling flares on campus
text:
BREAKING: University on LOCKDOWN after anti-Trump protestors hurl flares & smash windows BREAKING: University on LOCKDOWN after anti-Trump protestors hurl flares & smash windows RIOTERS have forced a university into lockdown after tearing down barricades and throwing flares at a building where a pro-Trump supporter was set to talk. PUBLISHED: 02:22,  45, Thu, Feb 2, 2017 Twitter/Julia Carrie Wong University engulfed in flames as anti-Trump supporters cancel Trump event 
Milo Yiannopoulos, a Breitbart news editor, was due to speak to students at the University of California at Berkeley yet the event was cancelled after student groups pledged to shut the event down. Police barricades being disassembled and windows broken at Milo at Berkeley pic.twitter.com/D5lWmI38Sw — Julia Carrie Wong (@juliacarriew) February 2, 2017 
In response to the violent rampage, the UC Berkeley police department tweeted: “Milo event cancelled. Shelter in place if on campus. All campus buildings on lockdown.” 
More to follow...
